name: Example Person
follow_ups_owed: Send that article they asked about
what_they_care_about: Rock climbing, career change, recently got a dog
dynamic: Easy, warm. They tend to reach out first. Could be more reciprocal.

name: Partner
what_they_care_about: Their work, the kids, quality time together
dynamic: We talk often but it's always surface-level. Could go deeper.
notes: The daily partner check is the most important output of this skill.

name: Work Colleague
what_they_care_about: Career growth, side projects, their dog
dynamic: Good working relationship. Could be deeper.
